caption: We had a wonderful time at Tastings downtown Indianapolis.   The food,  service and management team were superb.  We will definitely be back. Thanks for a grand evening!
I am not a wine drinker but this place made me love wine. great staff and such a wide selection
Be kind! Drink some wine!

We were staying at the Conrad and decided to try Tastings. We enjoyed the small plates and chose to ask the waitress to recommend a couple of wines instead of trying the tasting process. Very enjoyable evening. A few more regular tables for guests would be a good addition. It is hard to eat from a coffee table and upholstered chair.

This place... Let me tell you. Best wine experience and I am not a wine person.my wife loved it for our anniversary. The normal tasting process isn't occurring due to covid-19 but it does not change the awesome experience or atmosphere. Tastings setup this entire spread without me guiding them. AMAZING for our ten year.
Wonderful time!

This was my first wine tasting experience and I can guarantee it’ll be the best. Everyone was nice and courteous and Jay, the bartender, was astonishing. His mixology skills are 5 Star alone! My fiancée and I told him to do his thing and he treated us with a drink that tasted like chocolate cake!  BEST EXPERIENCE EVER.  Thank you! ❤️

We had an awesome experience. My husband really liked the Anne Amie wines, Pinot Noir and Pinot Grigio. I had the brownie with ice cream! It was delicious and our server Danae was a delight. Such a nice end to our date night in Indy.
Everything there was amazing! Best shot of chocolate birthday cake ever.
Great selections

Great place to sample wines you wouldn’t normally splurge on for a whole bottle.  Nice way to Treat Yo Self with out breaking the bank.  The cocktails at the bar were absolutely amazing, but the bartenders stories and explanations of the drinks made  it an experience worth going back for.
Great service
Love the atmosphere and service. Will definitely come visit again.
Can't say enough about this place! Service is spectacular, wine is delicious, the mixologists are phenomenal. Will absolutely be back.
~*I always love this place! Amazing wine! Yummy cheese selection and veggie options. The ambience is always pleasuring.*~
Attention to customer was top notch
I simply enjoy their dishes. I always get awesome customer service here. The place is well organised and the employees are always very friendly. Would recommend to others.
Outstanding!
The wine dispensers were....interesting
Had a excellent experience in this spot with my daughter. The food comes out fast and the service is just good. Prices are fair.
Totally fun! Great wine, good food, friendly and helpful staff, nice atmosphere.
Great place to grab a small-plate and glass of wine before a IRT performance.
Great wine selection. Self serve wine samples are a great touch.
Great drinks
A great place to enjoy the atmosphere and talk without blaring music. Service a little slow and prices a little high, but overall lovely.
Excellent atmosphere and bar tenders.
Great atmosphere!
Excellent experience with the staff, delicious food, lovely atmosphere!
Excellent service
Fun experience although I wish they had a wider array of sweet and white wines.  I enjoyed their small plates as well. Good place to watch a game or just relax.
It was really nice & well lit. Super fancy, great atmosphere. The host Chef Chuck is amazing!!

Couldn’t get service, so, I can’t say I’d recommend the experience—and I probably won’t be back. I took a seat at the corner of the bar and tried to flag down the bartender / or a waiter: no luck. Other patrons came in and were immediately greeted and served. I switched seats. More people arrived and were greeted and served while I was ignored. I switched to a high top table; same experience. After shuffling around the bar, I felt purposefully excluded/passed over because the bartender, and multiple waitresses, and I made eye contact...and I still received no acknowledgement or service. After 15-20 minutes of this, I just walked across the lobby to the bar at the Capital Grille.
Wine was yummy but a tad pricey.
Great place to relax and have a nice glass of wine.

They were a great place but if your not into wine and snacking or eating with the wine its not for you. If the prices per cup were slightly less expensive I would have been thrilled. But I personally will still come here if I get into the city again.

Cool place and great idea! Lots of samples to try and easy layout. Basically you buy a prepaid card and load it with cheddar. Then you use that to swipe at the machines to pay for your samples. Definitely recommend checking this place out!
Amaizing service. Perfect for chilling and enjoy an afternoon tasting good wines.
Great selection of wines. The staff mostly left us alone, but were available if we had questions. Some excellent desserts. Overall, it was a great experience.
Such a great way to taste many wines. Excellent service with Denise.
What a smart idea to have this self served wine tasting bar where you use a card to order your own wine from these cool machines! Great appetizers.. Came here for a party with our company, so fun!
Really awesome wine tasting spot.  This is definitely on the pricey side but you get to taste wines that you won't see out in the public very often.

Half off wine on Sundays was absolutely awesome! Service was great as well. I was however a bit put off by the food safety practices in the open kitchen. If you have an open kitchen concept, then you probably shouldn’t display that the person making your salad handles the raw steak right before arranging the lettuce without changing gloves.
What can I say... I love good wine!
Food is on the good side of ok.  Nothing super amazing but not terrible.  The atmosphere is super nice, and in an awesome spot.  The "wine ATM" setup is super cool too.
The service was excellent. They took such great care of me and help to make my birthday an experience to remember! Meredith and Tiffany you rock.

I have been here at least six times in the last seven years and never have been disappointed.  Tastings offers a great atmosphere in a great location with a fun format.  If you enjoy wine, this is a great choice for you.  The quality and teamwork of the staff at Tastings has stood out each time I have been there.
Awesome experience. Just recharge yor Tasting's Wine card and enjoy multiple wine tastes. The best wine is the wine you like! Great service!
Tasting is a great place. However I noticed some unethical practices by the staff. My total was edit from $64 to $43 to include a larger tip. I traditional tip in cash.

Don’t be fooled by the name. This is a great spot for wine, beer OR mixed drink experience. For our visit we stuck to mixed drinks. We were served a sensory experience from Jay with a sampling of tastes from around the world.  For all three of us it was an experience we’ll never forget. The layers of tastes in Jay’s customized drinks were refreshing, surprising and delicious.  Highly recommend to anyone in Indianapolis and a must do if you are staying at the Conrad.
Great beer

If you enjoy wine tasting, this is an absolute MUST! It's such a fun experience! We went for a girl's night and had a blast. They have approx. 75 different wines that you can taste. And it's self served! Kind of like a soda machine dispenser but for wine!!! You load your card, pick a choice of wine, and choose the amount you'd like - 2, 4, or 6 oz. Each one has a full description of the bottle of wine. They also have fodd that you can order. The cheese tray is a great option and the flatbread pizza was really good! Great ambiance and good customer service! I definitely recommend this place!
Great selection of wines and delicious crab cakes.
Loud and uninviting. I have no idea how this got so many positive reviews...? And many bottles were empty and machines needing gas to be revisited before I could pay. Major bummer.
Great for the seasoned wine drinker, but a little expensive otherwise.
Good service. Nice location for a date.  You can prefill a card to put a certain amount of money on it then select whatever wine you prefer at the wine vending machines.
It's like a wine arcade..... but a little pricey.

We were in town for a convention and everything was packed for dinner. Tastings had looked intriguing to me but I was not sure it was a great dinner location...however there was no problem getting in. Let me just say, we were really happy the other places were over booked. This was a delightful experience. The flatbreads were all good but the Goat cheese and Fig was outrageous! All the Bistro plates were much larger than we were expecting. It was Sunday, so there were a number of 1/2 price wines and shortly after we sat down, there was live music as well. If you want to sit down at a dinner table, this is not the place. But if you don't mind sitting in comfortable couches and sharing a number of "small" plates, this is a great place!
Nice time with a live band....
A little pricey, but great for a special night out!
They charged me $50 on prepaid tasting card, I used $20. But they never refund me the remaining $30. Be very careful of the tasting card remaining balance, they don't refund it!!!

Went here with my wife since shes been wanting to try it. Im not a big wine drinker but overall thought the experience was nice. On the other hand, my wife loved it!! We put money on a card and was able to walk around and try any of the wines we wanted to. Would definitely recommend anyone to try this place at least once!
I enjoyed this unique experience and setting good place to go with friends or the wife and try good wine.
Friendly staff

Came here for a wine tasting experience for date night. Would highly recommend! 4 wines with delicious appetizer pairings. We weren't hungry afterwards, but they do have flatbreads to order if you are. Would love to come back with friends to enjoy the bar. Service was excellent and fast. Ended up taking 2 bottles home as well.
Good wine & good food.
A great date place or event meeting place
Really fun set up ! Love the concept and you get to taste lots of wine :)
Excellent selection of cheeses and meats and wine at a reasonable price with staff that was very accommodating in advising us. Would definitely like to go again next time we're in Indianapolis.
Fun place to try wines!

Visiting for a conference, and loved the experience. Opted to load up the tastings sample card and hit up the dispensers. Ordered crab dip and a cheese plate which were both delicious. Staff was rather scarce when we tried to pay the bill, took a while. Maybe the rush was starting...? Overall, awesome.
What a fun way to do a wine tasting-at your own pace.  Definitely a stop any time we travel to Indianapolis.
The wait staff was great at making suggestions on what to taste. Good atmosphere too!

I’m traveling this week for work. At the end of the day I passed on the conference after hours thing and instead stopped by Tastings wine bar—OMGOODNESS it was amazing! Since I was by myself I sat at the bar and started making small talk w the bar tender. He helped me select cheese for a sampler and a glass of wine...it was amazing!! He then was like a Wikipedia of cocktails and cuisine. If ever in Indy you should stop by and see if Jay is tending bar. It really was a nice, comfortable, relaxing way to end the day. 😊 🍷😊 (and Tuesdays are 1/2 off the house wines—bonus!)
Hidden gem for higher quality liquor
Lovely experience. Great food and wine.
Great location and concept. A little over priced, but not too bad. Attached to the beautiful Conrad hotel.

The ambiance, decor and wine were good, but the service was totally inattentive. The server was friendly and personable but after we got our bottle of wine, she never came back. My boyfriend and I would have liked to order some cheese and charcuterie to go with it, but we had to flag her down to even get our check. At that time, I told her we needed to be at a show by nine, but then we still had to flag her down again to pick up the credit card.
We love Tastings and it is our tradition to visit every year during Drum Corps International Finals week!  Great food and we get to taste different ways that have been added to our lists of likes.
Went for my Anniversary, a nice experience
Awesome experience a selection if wine

We loved dining on dinners, taking advantage of their 1/2 price wine by the bottle. We were disappointed when we're got our check and found that only certain bottles were 1/2 priced. No mention of it on the web site nor by the server. Food and wine selection were still good, but may look around for our next Sunday evening wine outings.
Awesome selection, good food, great ambience.
Great service! Definitely will be back when we are looking for a nice night of wine and a snack.
I freaking love this place! The service is great, the employees are friendly and knowledgeable and it's a great place to relax and have a great time.

Loved this place. The service was excellent! The good was excellent - we ordered the white flat bread, the chicken pesto flat bread and a cheese plate. The flat bread 100% better then the pizza at California pizza place across the street. If I ever come back to Indy, I'd go here again.

Tastings is such a neat place. We love taking visitors from out of town there. I have also held an alumni event at Tastings. The food is very good and the wine even better. You are likely going to spend at least $10/person but most of the time more than that. You will prepay and get a card with that amount of money on it. Then you use that card to get your wine. Very neat place!
Service was extremely slow. Food took forever to come out
Unique wining and dining experience. Downtown gem. One of my favorite haunts.
Great atmosphere, live music on Sunday evenings
Nice place... Great atmosphere ..
Always a great time at Tastings

Terrible experience. Group of 10 of us went into enjoy a few bottles of wine and dessert.  Told by hostess it was open seating.   Received our wine lists and dessert menus.   10 minutes later waitress approaches us to say that they needed us out of our seat in 25 minutes as someone else had reserved the seats.  All 10 of us stood left and took our business to the Eagles Nest across the street.  Poor customer service / respect at Tastings.

Very rude! Told our group of 6 open seating... we sat at a table and then the server told us the table was reserved in 30 minutes.. so really,... are we going to just stay 30 minutes?!?! We are here for Indy 500 weekend and this was the only lowlight. Tastings is really a big disappointment!

Horrific service and lack of any idea of how to run a business.  Will return to Indy 500 next year and unless they change and learn customer service they will not be around...hopeful so as to make room in their prime space for a worthy business.
Rude staff who turn open seating to reserved seating with short notice (you must eat and be gone in a short time).

Low class. Went for wine and desserts. Told open seating ... when the finally got ready for the  order ... told we have 40 mins. This was not a White Castle event ... just poor management and inability to support a race weekend. We when went across the street ... get great service. Go elsewhere and save a disappointment.

It's an amazing place to try wines. Located right in the heart of indy downtown. The ambiance is very tranquilizing, elegant and very spacious too. They have good desserts. They have French press coffee, it's quite bitter in taste but if you like bitter coffee, you will love it.

Hubs and I were looking for some downtime after being in Indy for a conference and after spending a few hours running around the city, we spotting Tastings and thought it would be the perfect place to grab some vino, sit outside, and people watch. We were not disappointed.  We were able to sit outside at one of the tall tables on a 75 degree day. Cannot beat that! Our server came over and discussed some wines with us. I grabbed a vino verde while hubs started with a local beer. After our second round, our server changed. No biggie, but then on our third round, our server changed again. That is really my only reason for the deduction of star. It started making us feel as though they didn't want us hanging around, but we did anyway.  There were tons of passerbys and it is in a great location downtown, near the shopping area so you can take in the city in all it's grandeur while sitting and enjoying some vino.
Best cocktails in downtown Indy, best bartender!
I am visiting  Indianapolis. This place was super fun and the Bartender, Jay, was fantastic! I would come back to Indianapolis just to come here.
The place was empty because we came at a slow time, but it was the perfect atmosphere to sit and relax and enjoy a glass of wine after a long day of shopping.
I loved Tastings! Great experience, great atmosphere, I’d highly recommend for a fun girl’s night out!

The atmosphere is very relaxing and I really liked the concept. I tried about 6 different wines while there and found the system easy to use. I really like that people can go at their own pace and the couches were clean feeling and comfortable. The only reason it lost a star was for service. Our server started out amazing and funny, but then sort of disappeared. We never got water refills and it took us a really long time to cash out partly because we had to bother some other server to help us. I'd definitely go back, though, because the cool concept outweighed the service issues.

Perfect place to try wines from around the world and top notch cocktails in an elevated environment. Jay and Bryan are awesome, whatever you're looking for they exemplify personalized service and hospitality. If you like the idea of pouring your own wine on demand this is a nice system. Preload a card with cash, choose your wine and amount and go. Pair with cheese, tapas etc.

So we came here to celebrate my cousin's and his girlfriend's recent milestone achievements and the experience was nothing short of A M A Z I N G ! We were assisted by Samuel- who happens to be a wine connoisseur. He was very vibrant, knowledgeable and welcoming. We had a great time and we look forward to coming back when we're  in town.  Management- I highly recommend Samuel for a promotion AND please open a location in SOUTH FLORIDA‼

Exceptional customer service provided by Samuel. My family and I were visiting from Florida and stopped into this place for wine tasting. The customer service provided by Samuel was unbelievable. He was very knowledgeable and extremely friendly. It was an honor to have him serve us. We are extremely satisfied with the service provided by Samuel. He is truly an asset to Tastings. We will definitely come back and also recommend this place to many. Thank you again! This experience have been absolutely amazing! Again THANK YOU!!!!!

My girlfriend and I had just got engaged on the Canal we went in to get drinks and celebrate. Their cheese and salami plate was delicious, drinks were great, atmosphere was perfect, and the staff was super friendly. They even congratulated us and gave us a round of drinks on the house!! We would highly recommend this place.
This is a great place if you love wine.
The wine dispensers and little card with money on it are a cool concept, but the prices are very high.

Delicious small plates.  We had a cheese plate, crab dip, and the "ceviche".  The ceviche was good, more like tomatoes with some shrimp; don't expect a Peruvian dish, you will be disappointed.  The wine part is fun. You can purchase by the glass, 1/2 glass, or just a taste.  You get your own pours so no need to wait for a server for a refill.  There is a wide selection of wines to choose from with descriptions of each.  The white and dessert selections leave a little to be desired.  Over all I love this place and would return.
Jay is amazing. I've never met a bartender that evolves with me. He took information over the time of the night and at the end, craft a drink especially for me.
Great concept and love the selection of wines not to mention the atmosphere. Great location to people watch.
I normally don't try new things, but the cheeses that they have are wonderful. Great service and the mood was excellent!
First time here. Interesting concept. We enjoyed being able to wander and pick and choose what we wanted to taste.
Cozy, quiet, and excellent variety. Just a great place to unwind
Favorite place! Great people!
Large selection of wines to try, but high cost.
Great deal on Sunday half price bottles of wine
Love the atmosphere here
Good wine, but pricey. Worth it if you have the money!
This place is amazing!  The staff are so helpful, the food is great and the fact you can taste wine whenever you want is ingenious !!
Great wine special on Tuesdays!

Like the name implies, the bar is centered around wine Tastings.  You load up a card with a certain amount of money, and are able to go around to various wine bottles and taste a small sample.  This is certainly a wine bar, as the beer and liquor selection is somewhat scant.  The food and appetizers, however, do not disappoint.

This place is for the grown and sexy only! Great lighting to set the mood, soft music, great ambience all together. If you are a fan of wine this is the place for you! They also have outdoor seating for those warm nights and during the winter time they usually have a jazz band after a certain hour in doors. I love this place, it's a great addition to downtown Indy.
Sampling wines at tastings feels like playing an arcade game, but you're at a fancy bar, drinking wine.
Really great and fun experience, and as you would expect fantastic wine. I am not sure how I feel about the card to pay for drinks it is neat but makes leaving quite a hassle.

This is a neat place to unwind after a long day. The vibe is very relaxing and the service is fantastic. We arrived around 10pm on a Saturday night expecting the place to be really busy. But due to the Colts/Patriots playoff game it wasn't. We grabbed 4 seats at the back bar and proceeded with our evening. This is only my second time ever being in this location before and I was happy to see a full bar especially since I am not a wine drinker. The service at the bar was exceptional and they were able to make whatever I wanted. Jonathon was behind the bar and he makes a fabulous Cosmopolitan! During the course of the evening there was wait staff that stopped by and made sure we were doing alright.  The only negative that I have to share, even though it isn't really a negative, is the prices at the bar. I ordered 2 drinks, and a friend put their drink on my tab... the total was $34.00. A Bacardi & Coke was $9.50!!! I expected a higher tab due to the fact that I had a Cosmo, but that was way more than I was expecting. Again, this isn't really a negative, but if you're on a tight budget this is not the place for you to grab drinks with a friend. If you are looking for a sophisticated lounge to chill and have a few drinks, then this is right up your alley.  I definitely will return for another fun filled, sophisticated "gay" night out!
Lively and tasty.  Very good food.  Nice vegetarian options.

Wow, what an impressive set up. Now granted we are not what you would call "wine experts" but we have an idea as to what we want! It was 4 of us with a taste for something better than your $7.99 bottle of wine!  The bottle selection is great, they have a taste for everyone! Tour Europe, Napa Valley and some of Italy's finest. I had the Merlot and it was splendid! God was it amazing! I recommend you go there and try it, at least just once. I am glad I did. Great service, great selection, great atmosphere.
Food is ok.  Staff seems like they are watching the clock.  Closed early due to lack of customers.
Loved it. Great service, reasonably priced food (and absolutely delicious),  and great wine selection. Would recommend to anyone interested in broadening their wine experience.

My (very conservative) mother and I had tickets to a play at the IRT on a Tuesday night. The receptionist at IRT mentioned we got a 20% discount if we showed our theater tickets at Tastings. Tuesday nights are also ½ priced wine nights so we figured it was worth a shot. IT WAS GREAT. I do need to mention that we went in on a Tuesday night at 530 but it was great. Service, food and wine all get a thumbs up. Waitress was very sweet and helpful. Food came out quickly. We got to try several very nice wines and each ordered a glass (1/2 priced!) and had 2 appetizers for under $40. We then got distracted by the art that is displayed all over the walls leading to the restroom. While we were looking at a painting, a staff member of the Conrad wandered up to us and took us on an awesome tour of the entire hotel and told us all about their art. Great experience. Highly recommend.
Great way to start date.
Food and service were great. It can get a little loud with late night drinkers

I tried to call and book an event for 20-25 people since on their website is gives idea that they can offer private parties.  I left two messages and did not receive a call back and finally had to call myself to speak to someone.  I was rudely told that they would not do a party or even a reservation even though I was planning on coming in and spending a good amount of money in their place.  I will never recommend them for any of my event planning friends and will never myself go into the restaurant and spend money with people who do not appreciate their potential customers.
